mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM Manufacture_Result WHERE Manufacture_no = #{Manufacture_no}
mapper.sql: Manufacture_no, Order_no_details, Staff_no_manufacture, Staff_no_design, Product_no, Stock_no, Update_date
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from Manufacture_Result where flag=0
order by ${orderByClause}
select count(*) from Manufacture_Result where flag=0

select
from Manufacture_Result where Manufacture_no = #{Manufacture_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0
select * from Manufacture_Result where Order_no_details = #{Order_no_details,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0
select * from Manufacture_Result where Staff_no_manufacture = #{Staff_no_manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0

select * from Manufacture_Result where flag=0 and to_days(Update_date) = to_days(#{Update_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and Manufacture_no like '%${Manufacture_no}%' and Order_no_details like '%${Order_no_details}%' and Product_no like '%${Product_no}%' and Staff_no_manufacture like '%${Staff_no_manufacture}%'

select * from Manufacture_Result where flag=0 and Manufacture_no like '%${Manufacture_no}%' and Order_no_details like '%${Order_no_details}%' and Product_no like '%${Product_no}%' and Staff_no_manufacture like '%${Staff_no_manufacture}%'
mapper.insert: insert into Manufacture_Result (Manufacture_no, Order_no_details, Staff_no_manufacture, Staff_no_design, Product_no, Stock_no, Update_date) values (#{Manufacture_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Order_no_details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Staff_no_manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Staff_no_design,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Stock_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Update_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into Manufacture_Result
Manufacture_no,
Order_no_details,
Staff_no_manufacture,
Staff_no_design,
Product_no,
Stock_no,
Update_date,
#{Manufacture_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update Manufacture_Result
Product_no = #{record.Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Product_name = #{record.Product_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Product_type = #{record.Product_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Ingredient_List = #{record.Ingredient_List,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Manufacture_duration = #{record.Manufacture_duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Guarantee_period = #{record.Guarantee_period,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Unit_Price = #{record.Unit_Price,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update Manufacture_Result set Product_no = #{record.Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Product_name = #{record.Product_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Product_type = #{record.Product_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ingredient_List = #{record.Ingredient_List,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Manufacture_duration = #{record.Manufacture_duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Guarantee_period = #{record.Guarantee_period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Unit_Price = #{record.Unit_Price,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update Manufacture_Result
Product_no = #{Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Product_name = #{Product_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Product_type = #{Product_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Ingredient_List = #{Ingredient_List,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Manufacture_duration = #{Manufacture_duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Guarantee_period = #{Guarantee_period,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Unit_Price = #{Unit_Price,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where Product_no = #{Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update Manufacture_Result set Product_no = #{Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Product_name = #{Product_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Product_type = #{Product_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ingredient_List = #{Ingredient_List,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Manufacture_duration = #{Manufacture_duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Guarantee_period = #{Guarantee_period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Unit_Price = #{Unit_Price,jdbcType=BIGINT} where Product_no = #{Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
